participant_1.name: Mia Thompson
participant_1.personality: Mia is adventurous and outgoing, always seeking new experiences, especially in nature.
participant_1.background: i have brown curly hair. i'll graduate from high school in two years. i like riding horses. my bedroom is purple and lime green.

participant_2.name: Jake Anderson
participant_2.personality: Jake is laid-back and friendly, with a passion for classic cars and a love for good music.
participant_2.background: i own two vintage mustangs. my favorite music is country. i like to work on vintage cars. i've two dogs.
